csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <macro name="bogus">
    <text variable="volume" />
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <names variable="translator">
        <name />
        <substitute>
          <text macro="bogus" />
          <names variable="author" />
          <group>
            <text variable="title" />
            <text prefix=", " value="... this should NOT appear" />
          </group>
        </substitute>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
